description: This file initializes an Agent with a WatsonX model and demonstrates how to generate and print a response to a prompt, specifically for sharing a horror story.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a language model, capable of running prompts and printing responses.

classes.name: WatsonX
classes.description: A model class representing IBM's WatsonX language model.

methods.name: Agent.__init__
methods.description: Constructor for the Agent class, initializes with a model and optional markdown setting.

methods.name: Agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt with the agent, optionally streaming the response.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Prints the response to a prompt directly to the terminal.

methods.name: WatsonX.__init__
methods.description: Constructor for the WatsonX model class, initialized with a specific model ID.
